summary: A new waitress working at an Italian restaurant in New York City finds herself entangled in a mob-run underworld of drug dealing and murder.
cast: Mira Sorvino|Mariah Carey|Melora Walters|Arthur J. Nascarella|Saul Stein|Joseph Siravo|Christian Maelen|Anthony Alessandro|Louis Di Bianco|Noam Jenkins|Jeremiah Sparks|Dax Ravina|Karen Giordano|Michael Egan|Jere Gillis|Steve Alonso|Tina Bruno|Isa Thomas|Jan Glenham|Lisa Ward|Peter Baylis|Lisa Croft|Rudolfo Meloni|Omar Corsetti|Dimitri Iatrou|Joseph Dibari|Howard Gibson|Nick Smyth
title: Atrapadas por la mafia
